system.requirements:
Tier 2; 1+ Cybernetic Limbs, Tech-Use 
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Tech
system.effect: As a Half Action, character can spend Fate Point and make +0 Tech-Use Test. If succesful they gain Unnatural Agility (X) or Unnatural Strength (X) Trait, where X = 1, +1 per 2 DoS scored on Test. (if they have the trait, increase by X instead). The bonus lasts until the character decides to end it, which can be done at any time. However, at the end of each Round in which it persists, they gain 1 Fatigue.
